Package main

Class Main

java.lang.Object
main.Main
public class Main extends Object

Serves as the main file for our game. This is the file you should run to play our game.

This class initializes the game window, timer, and other necessary components.

Since:
February 20, 2024
Author:
Nick Clouse, Andrew Denegar, Molly O'Connor
See Also:
  • JFrame
  • HomeScreen
  • GamePanel

  • Method Details

    • addScoreToLeader

      public static void addScoreToLeader()
      Adds player score to respective leaderboard.

    • addTime

      public static void addTime(int t)
      Adds more time to the time player has left.
      Parameters:
      t - Time to add.

    • closeMainWindow

      public static void closeMainWindow()
      Closes the main window. Stops the game and disposes of the main window.

    • disablePanels

      public static void disablePanels()
      Removes the game over screen, used when the player chooses play again after running out of time in a level.

    • enemyKilled

      public static void enemyKilled()
      Adds 1 to the players enemy kill count

    • gameOverPanel

      public static void gameOverPanel(boolean show)
      Disables the other panels and displays the "Game Over" game panel, when player runs out of time
      Parameters:
      show - If game over screen should be displayed.

    • getLevel

      public static int getLevel()
      Gets the current level the player is on. If the homePanel hasn't been initialized yet or it's currently being displayed, then it returns 3 so the overall leaderboard can be displayed.
      Returns:
      The current level.

    • getScore

      public static int getScore()
      Gets the score of the player.
      Returns:
      The current score for the player.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method to start the game.
      Parameters:
      args - The arguments passed to the main method.

    • otherPanelRunning

      public static boolean otherPanelRunning()
      Returns true if the next level panel is still running and being seen
      Returns:
      true if gameOver is running

    • resetTime

      public static void resetTime()
      Resets the game timer and associated variables. Stops the timer, resets the elapsed time, and starts listening for arrow key presses to restart the timer.

    • restartGame

      public static void restartGame()
      Resets the game and removes the old window and starts a new one

    • runMainCode

      public static void runMainCode()
      Creates window and starts game. Initializes the game window and starts the game loop.

    • showFinalWinScreen

      public static void showFinalWinScreen(boolean show)
      Disables the other panels and displays the "You win" game panel
      Parameters:
      show - If final win screen should be displayed.

    • showGamePanel

      public static void showGamePanel()
      Disables the other panels and displays the main game panel

    • turnOffGamePanelMusic

      public static void turnOffGamePanelMusic()
      Stops the game panel music (used for when the player dies)

    • turnOnGamePanelMusic

      public static void turnOnGamePanelMusic()
      Starts the game panel music (used for after the player dies)

    • showNextLevelPanel

      public static void showNextLevelPanel(boolean show)
      Disables the other panels and displays the "Next Level" game panel
      Parameters:
      show - If next level screen should be displayed.

    • stopTime

      public static void stopTime()
      Stops the timer

    • updateTotalTimeAndEnemies

      public static void updateTotalTimeAndEnemies()
      Updates the total time and the total enemies a player has killed in a level
